C

Continent - Class in model
Continent Class has the information about continents like the continent name,continent control value, continent color and index values of Continents All the countries that belong to a continent are stored in HashMap,where the key is the Country String and its value is corresponding Country Object.
Continent(String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Continent
Creates a Continent object with the arguments passed This constructor will be used when loading .map files
Continent(String, int) - Constructor for class model.Continent
Creates a Continent based on continentId and controlValue(used in editMap) Will be used when user defined continents are to be created.
continentConnectivityCheck(GameMap) - Method in class model.MapValidator
Checks if all continents are connected sub-graphs or not
controller - package controller
 
CountryDetails - Class in model
CountryDetails class have all the details of countries related to the selected .map file.
CountryDetails() - Constructor for class model.CountryDetails
Set CountryDetails object with default values.
CountryDetails(String, String) - Constructor for class model.CountryDetails
Create CountryDetails object with values in argument parameters and set defaults for the rest.
CountryDetails(String, String, String, String, String, GameMap) - Constructor for class model.CountryDetails
Creates CountryDetails object as per the argument parameters.
createGraph(GameMap) - Method in class model.MapValidator
Creates a graph(using jgrapht library) by taking countries as vertices and adds edges between country and its neighbors
createSubGraph(Graph<CountryDetails, DefaultEdge>, HashMap<String, CountryDetails>) - Method in class model.MapValidator
This function creates a subgraph for a continent
